law.catch_line: Procedure for transfer of coverage for judge formerly under plan established by city of second or third class.
law.text: If a person covered by a pension plan established under KRS 26.650 or 26.653 is elected as a District Judge before January 1, 1978, the provisions of subsections (2) to (5) of KRS 61.527 shall be carried out by the governing body of any pension plan applying to District Judges.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 2, effective January 1, 1978.
